entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lillooet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lillooet 6:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Snow level lowering to 600 metres this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow level 600 metres. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
